mapper.select: SELECT tbboard.id ,tbboard.title ,tbboard.content ,tbboard.deleted ,tbboard.created_at ,tbboard.modified_at ,tbboard.tbuser_id ,IF(tbuser.deleted = 'Y', '(정보없음)', tbuser.nick) as tbuser_nick ,tbuser.mpic as tbuser_mpic FROM tbboard, tbuser WHERE tbboard.id = #{id} AND tbboard.tbuser_id = tbuser.id

SELECT tbboard.id ,tbboard.title ,tbboard.content ,tbboard.deleted ,tbboard.created_at ,tbboard.modified_at FROM tbboard WHERE tbboard.id is not null AND tbboard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbboard.deleted = #{deleted}

SELECT tbboard.id FROM tbboard WHERE tbboard.id is not null AND tbboard.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbboard.created_at AND tbboard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbboard.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY tbboard.created_at ORDER BY tbboard.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(tbboard.id) as listsize FROM tbboard WHERE tbboard.id is not null AND tbboard.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00.000000') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59.999999') >= tbboard.created_at AND tbboard.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND tbboard.deleted = #{deleted}
